column5: Howdy, I wanted to reach out to the WC community to let people know about an opening for the first week of the walleye season on Nagagami Lake in Ontario. I try to hit this week every year, however, for work reasons I can't get my vacation approved. As such I didn't want to leave the camp (Expeditions-North) in a lurch so I'm posting the opening here. If you're interested, the week is May 19-26. The fishing that time of the year is amazing. Truly world class for walleye and great for pike (please release them). If you have been looking for a week in Ontario at a time that is normally fully booked now is your chance to get a group together. Feel free to PM for lake info. Take care, Ruddiger

I can't go, but thought I would add my 2 cents. We went to Nagagami and stayed at Expeditions North for a week in July a few years ago. Expeditions North is a great operation and the fishing on Nagagami is quite good. Large average sized walleye for sure. Price is very reasonable as well. Been considering going back for quite some time, just hasn't worked out.
Are you trying to fill one spot (yours) or are you part of a group?
Howdy, Great question. To be more clear, the entire cabin is available to whatever group wants to rent it. Take care, Ruddiger
